_header: On a time reigned in Rome the Emperor Decius
Subjects: Paul(in) the Hermit, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Paulin (or Paul) the Hermit, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines: On a tyme rengned in rome þe emperour decie…
Bod779.Last Lines: …Ihesu for paulinus loue ȝif it ben þy willeCheldin vs fram þe foule fend þat he vs nauȝt ne spill
Bod779.Note: Last ten lines crossed out in MS (all on f. 227).
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 386-8.
